entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of rain. Low plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of showers. Fog patches developing near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 6:19 PM EDT Thursday 27 April 2023
